text: SRM (Sharekey Rights Management): a Role can be set by Default for all sharings.
Large Files: Desktop & Web apps support 1GB file uploads/downloads.
Secure Viewer: arrow key scrolling enabled for PDFs.
Channels: when adding Members to a Channel, they are now sorted on their most recent message to you.
Sign Up: only professional email addresses now accepted to create an account.
Enhanced Cybersecurity: increased security checks on Rights.
Bug Fixes & Improvements: mainly in Direct/Channels, Video Calls and Annotations for a better user experience.
